definition: square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: I consent to take any pre-employment physical examination required by the Company.
sentences.chinese: 本人愿意接受公司要求的职前体格检查。

sentences.english: On physical examination he was afebrile with no sign of meningism.
sentences.chinese: 经体格检查无发热及假性脑膜炎迹象。

sentences.english: Physical examination revealed tachypnea; tachycardia, and cyanosis.
sentences.chinese: 体格检查发现呼吸急促，心动过速及发绀。

sentences.english: Elephants are too big to run.
Very occasionally comes a Jairzinho's body moment.
sentences.chinese: 有关雅伊尔津霍体格这样的时候非常少见。

sentences.english: It cannot easily be palpated on physical examination.
sentences.chinese: 通过体格检查很难被触诊。

sentences.english: She has to have a medical before going abroad.
sentences.chinese: 出国前她必须进行体格检查。

sentences.english: Her physical examination was remarkable for bilateral crackles in the lung bases.
sentences.chinese: 体格检查在双肺底部可闻明显的杂音。

sentences.english: I have to have a medical examination before going abroad.
sentences.chinese: 出国前我必须进行体格检查。

sentences.english: Jack whirled to find a heavy-set man facing him.
sentences.chinese: 杰克飞快地转过身，发现一个体格魁伟的男人。

sentences.english: Hand-Carried Ultrasound Performed by Hospitalists: Does It Improve the Cardiac Physical Examination?
sentences.chinese: 医务工作者进行的便携式超声能否改善心脏体格检查？

sentences.english: Mr Obama has been teased by political  opponents in the past about his physique.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马之前就因体格问题遭到政敌们的嘲笑。

sentences.english: To get the most out of life, one needs GREat physical powers and an iron constitution.
sentences.chinese: 为了尽情享受人生，必须要有强壮和健康的体格。

sentences.english: Physical. examination and some tests of child's motion and physiology.
sentences.chinese: 体格检查和运动生理测查。

sentences.english: Immediately before the physical examination, the patient should void as normally and completely as possible.
sentences.chinese: 在体格检查前患者应该放松和排空膀胱。

sentences.english: Patients were evaluated on the basis of a physical examination and a review of medical records.
sentences.chinese: 病人在体格检查和医疗文件回顾的基础上被评估。
